comment.author: 82609930@N06
comment._content: This is Carol M. Highsmith.  I photographed the Adams Building so that the images could be donated copyright-free to the Library of Congress and the American People or anyone who loves art.  As I was walking around the Adams Building, I noticed that there were owls featured everywhere.  Owls, of course, represent wisdom.  The Library of Congress has an abundance of that.

comment.author: 60139144@N00
comment._content: Thank you, Carol. The photos are lovely. I've taken photos of architectural and ornamentation details at LC in the past, but your photos are just superb.

comment._content: These are spectacular!  Thanks for taking the time to share these treasures.
